articles.author: DAVID KOENIG
articles.title: Southwest will limit hiring and drop 4 airports after loss. American Airlines posts 1Q loss as well - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Southwest Airlines will limit hiring and stop flying to four airports as it copes with weak financial results and delays in getting new planes from Boeing.  ...
articles.content:
DALLAS (AP) Southwest Airlines will limit hiring and stop flying to four airports as it copes with weak financial results and delays in getting new planes from Boeing.

articles.title: Hamas video of Gaza captive Hersh Goldberg-Polin triggers Israel protests - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The 23-year-old Israeli American criticises Israeli PM Netanyahu in the undated three-minute clip.
articles.content: Hamas has released a video of an Israeli-American man held captive in the Gaza Strip for the duration of Israels war on the enclave, igniting new protests calling on the Israeli government to do more… [+4086 chars]
